title: The Loved One
occurrences: - Was your loved one a relative? - Yes. He was my uncle.
May I ask what was your loved one's name?
- What did your loved one pass on from? - He hanged himself.
Now, was there anything especially characteristic of your loved one?
our Mr. Starker will counsel you as to your loved one's additional needs.
Mr. Barlow's loved one is Sir Francis Hinsley.
Here is the strangulated loved one for the Gothic Slumber Room.
Would it inspire you to work on a loved one who was like me?
Unto almighty God, we commend the soul of our loved one departed.
- Where is the loved one? - oh, you mean, Arthur?
